actors.name: 子安武人
actors.short_summary:
子安武人, 名字之所以會叫「武人」是因為他的生日是日本的兒童節。
他和三木真一郎、關智一、结城比吕组成声优团体Weiß，主要的作品是《白色猎人》。 
有一小點的巧合是他演出的角色為金髮男子居多，其角色個性很廣泛，不論是搞笑型的，或是嚴肅型的角色皆為其拿手範圍內，另一方面一些其貌不揚或性情古怪的角色也非常擅長。
本人称自己也不能算做很喜欢饰演变态或搞笑角色，只是有这么的工作就接了，结果却慢慢得越来越多。

1988-1998年隶属于事务所Production Baobab，此后成立自己的会社T's Factory。

detail.summary:
汽车人成员，可变形为警车。
警车一旦接受任务，就会有始有终。他喜欢努力发掘蕴藏在事物中的原理和逻辑，是擎天柱的左右手，也是出色的管理者和逻辑学家。他的职责就是组织、训练汽车人战士，随时准备和霸天虎展开战斗。
他拥有汽车人中历史最悠久的逻辑中心，能在极短时间内对复杂的战斗局面进行分析并给出恰当的建议，能发射线导导弹和强腐蚀性的硫酸弹。由于逻辑电路过于精密，毫无先兆的突发事件常常会扰乱警车的电路。
detail.name: Prowl

detail.summary:
Optimus Primal is one of the most prominent and well recognized Maximals in Transformers history. He has saved the Maximals, Earth, history, humanity, the universe, the Autobots, Cybertron, the Transformers, and the Alternity, starting from humble beginnings as an exploratory starship captain.
猩猩队长是巨无霸的领袖，擎天柱的后代，带领巨无霸对抗原始兽。野兽模式为银背大猩猩。
detail.name: Optimus Primal

detail.summary:
Megatron is the founder of the Decepticon uprising, and their most well-known and feared leader. As a young, charismatic leader forged in battle and the heritage of war, he began to believe in a grand purpose for his race—it is the Transformers' glorious destiny to rule an empire which will span the universe. The opposite of his mortal enemy Optimus Prime, he feels great contempt for other Transformers who, he feels, betray their proud heritage by demanding peace and cooperation with weaker life forms. It is the destiny of the Decepticons to bring order to the universe through conquest, though in the millions of years since coining this purpose it remains to be seen how much of his mission statement is altruistic... and how much of it is mere words built to fuel warriors to further his desire for personal power.

Megatron will attempt almost anything to achieve his goals, but his schemes are rarely in any way subtle. This is perhaps due to his arrogance, but his pride is not so strong as to dissuade him from abandoning a battle he is losing. He often shows dramatic examples of cowardice, concealed in rage. Although he isn't as physically strong as Optimus, his ability to analyze any situation and utilize it as a weapon makes the Decepticons deadly, so they can find energy sources almost immediately. Some would question his sanity, though these few are mostly now dead by his hands... or his fusion cannon, depending on his mood. Sometimes he uses his energon mace to strike them down. It does not matter how they die. Death by the hands of Megatron is an honor.

Megatron is often reborn as Galvatron.
detail.name: Megatron

detail.summary:
汽车人的重要成员之一，最优秀的医师，曾经成功救治许多汽车人军官。
救护车十分聪慧，身为一名医师，他的技术无人可比，一旦下定决心，只要外界条件与时间允许，他就一定会能完成任务。救护车不但精通变形金刚的生理学，而且对人类和主要银河种族的生理构造也了如指掌。他装备有各种各样的医疗设备，包括激光手术刀、电弧焊接器、电子传感器、诊断器等等。他的激光手术刀也可以用作攻击的武器，但火力不是很强。在战斗中，救护车往往选择使用一把标准的激光枪来弥补他自身火力的不足。救护车于2005年牺牲于汽车人和霸天虎的大战之中
detail.name: Ratchet

value.v: 看護員 ラチェット

detail.summary:
Dinobot is a Predacon ruled by his sense of honor. He lives to die gloriously in battle. When he aided Megatron in the theft of the Golden Disk, Dinobot believed he was in the pursuit of endless glory. But when he and his Predacon peers crashed on what seemed to be the wrong planet alongside a Maximal exploration vessel, he rebelled against Megatron and joined the Maximal team. It would be an uneasy alliance, fraught with turns of loyalty and turns of Shakespearean phrase. But it also led to strong friendships and even the salvation of all humanity. 
恐龙勇士是一位追求荣誉的原始兽，为此他加入巨无霸，与其他原始兽为敌。
detail.name: Dinobot

detail.summary: Primarily used for recon and surveillance due to her aerial alternate mode, Airazor (sometimes formerly Wing Saber) is a great asset to the Maximal cause.
detail.name: Airazor

detail.summary:
多才多艺，聪明大胆，但是注意力容易分散。他喜欢地球文化，总是求知若渴，不知满足。他对地球的丰富知识使他成为擎天柱不可或缺的左膀右臂。当最危险的任务出现时，他总是奋不顾身，首当其冲。
虽然喜欢扮酷追求流行时尚，但爵士出色的办事能力绝对毋庸置疑。其配备有光子枪，火焰喷射器，全光谱探照灯，180高分贝立体声扩音器，能制造出绚烂迷人的声光效果。
G1中爵士车型为Martini Racing Porsche 935 Turbo。
detail.name: Jazz

detail.summary: 汽车人(博派)领袖擎天柱的贴身保镖兼武器专家，擎天柱的老朋友。
detail.name: Ironhide

value.v: 警備員 アイアンハイド

detail.summary:
Optimus Prime is the awe-inspiring leader of the Autobot forces. Selfless and endlessly courageous, he is the complete opposite of his mortal enemy Megatron. Originally a mere civilian known as Orion Pax or Optronix, he was chosen by the Matrix of Leadership to command, the first in a number of heavy burdens he has been forced to bear. Another is his bringing of the Transformers' conflict to Earth. Every casualty, human or Cybertronian weighs heavily on his spark. He does not show this side to his soldiers and never succumbs to despair. The Autobots need a decisive, charismatic leader and that is what he gives them. It was that leadership which turned the tide of the Great War.

On the battlefield, there are few who rival Optimus Prime's prowess. He is easily the strongest of any Autobot his size, and his ion blaster and energon-axe are deadly weapons. He would sacrifice his life to protect his fellow Autobots or those under their care and does so on a regular basis. His compassion for other sentient beings is his only real weakness, and one the Decepticons have taken advantage of time and again... though it's also the source of his strength!
detail.name: Optimus Prime

detail.summary: 变速箱是经方舟改造过的最强健的博派战士，他的燃料利用率和整体耐力都很高。他惯于装载沉重的物资，有时还会负载体力虚弱的伙伴，进行长距离行驶。他腿部的压缩空气推进器能让他上升到20英里高的空中然后徐徐飘落，不过他在空中的机动能力非常有限。变速箱具有红外线视觉，因此他在晚上可以像在白天一样工作。
detail.name: Gears
